3.text: Select the grit of the stone.

4.text: Follow the instructions that came with your stone.

5.text: Practice holding the knife at a 20 degree angle.
5.vid: /5/54/Sharpen a Knife With a Stone Step 5 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.text: Soak the water stone for 45 minutes.
6.vid: /3/3f/Sharpen a Knife With a Stone Step 6 Version 3.360p.mp4

7.text: Place the stone on a damp cloth.
7.vid: /0/00/Sharpen a Knife With a Stone Step 7 Version 3.360p.mp4

8.vid: /3/3f/Sharpen a Knife With a Stone Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.text: Hold the knife against the stone.
9.vid: /7/78/Sharpen a Knife With a Stone Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Sweep one side of the blade across the stone.
10.vid: /0/07/Sharpen a Knife With a Stone Step 10 Version 3.360p.mp4

11.text: Turn the knife over and sharpen the other side.
11.vid: /e/ef/Sharpen a Knife With a Stone Step 11 Version 3.360p.mp4

12.text: Sharpen the stone on a finer grit.
12.vid: /8/80/Sharpen a Knife With a Stone Step 12 Version 3.360p.mp4

13.text: Test the sharpness of the knife.
13.vid: /f/fd/Sharpen a Knife With a Stone Step 13 Version 3.360p.mp4

14.vid: /a/a8/Sharpen a Knife With a Stone Step 14 Version 3.360p.mp4
